title: SCP-5002 - A Death In Containment
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[=]]
Hi, this is my artwork for [[[SCP-5002]]], my favorite 5Kcon entry.
Tried my best to make it look like a movie poster, but it just keeps going longer and longer and LONGER...
Anyway, I wish you like it.

[[include component:image-block
    name=Artwork_5002.jpg|
    caption=[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5002 Does any author know what effect their work will have, once they emancipate it?]|
    align=center|
    width=380px|
]]
